channel.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
channel.description:
Lately an old friend of mine has been Ddosing me.
Simply... How would I go about stopping it?
He get's my Ip whenever I talk to him or He get's it threw my No-Ip.

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Adam:

Contact your ISP and let them know what’s going on. A DDoS is illegal in the United States. Have him prosecuted.

Sounds retarded, but 2 of my friends reported him to the F.B.I. but that was weeks ago and nothing has happened, and he continues to ddos people.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about stopping Ddosers

@Mod_Adam wrote:

Contact your ISP and let them know what’s going on. A DDoS is illegal in the United States. Have him prosecuted.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about stopping Ddosers

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:321973”][quote author=Spades link=topic=418392.msg3075746#msg3075746 date=1261811234]

Block his IP with a firewall? That was hard…

How would I go about doing that without knowing his IP?

If he is attacking you, you know his IP already.

I’m a complete retard when it comes to this stuff, while he is ddosing me, how would I be able to find his IP?
[/quote]

Try the ‘netstat’ command, it tells you all the current connections to your server.[/quote]

It’s not a server, it is my actual internet. The kid who is ddosing me doesn’t play Private Servers, he just plays RuneScape. He is a RuneScape addict who ddoses people when he gets mad at them. And that’s what he does, he has a program, that allows him to get anyone’s IP that he deals with, so like MSN and Skype, he even has Jagex’s IP cause he plays RuneScape(He has their servers Ip, individual worlds)

If I block his IP then I will have to block 50 others, on a daily basis. He will just keep on changing his IP and ddosing me when he has a chance.

Is there any type of a program that blocks it out so only a certain amount of connections can connect to my router in a certain amount of time.

My router is strong enough, so if he ddoses me like on RuneScape, I have 3 seconds to do something to avoid it.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about stopping Ddosers

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:6, topic:321973”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=418392.msg3075676#msg3075676 date=1261805075]

Block his IP with a firewall? That was hard…

How would I go about doing that without knowing his IP?

If he is attacking you, you know his IP already.
[/quote]

I’m a complete retard when it comes to this stuff, while he is ddosing me, how would I be able to find his IP?[/quote]

Try the ‘netstat’ command, it tells you all the current connections to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about stopping Ddosers

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You should make your firewall ignore pings…

For example I want to find out the IP of some random server, I’ll just do this:

ping somerandomserver.no-ip.org

It answers with:

Ping to somerandomserver.no-ip.org 32 byte data:
Response from 68.1.2.3: bytes=32 time=131 ms TTL=46

Voila. Your Ip…

Read full topic
item.source: How would I go about stopping Ddosers

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:11, topic:321973”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=418392.msg3078308#msg3078308 date=1261995497]
Maybe it’s not a DDoS but a

Virus

:rolleyes:
[/quote]

Wtf… It is not a Virus…[/quote]

Its easy. All you need is an AK - 47, a bundle of TNT and a cool getaway car.

Possibly some petrol too.

Read full topic

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

It is not for a Private Server…

And I have my FireWall on, which is probably why when he ddoses me I don’t completely crash. He uses bots to crash peoples internet, so he does use more then just his IP… He has like… 50 by now.

Read full topic

How would I go about doing that without knowing his IP?

item.title: How would I go about stopping Ddosers
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:321973”]I doubt he is ‘DDoSing’ you. He’s probably crashing your server and saying that he is ‘DDosing’ you?

P.S. - DDoS is not a verb, hence the ’ … ’ around DDosing.[/quote]

He is not a RSPS guy, he ddoses me. And I know he is ddosing me because my server will remain online, players will Disconnect, and my Web-browser’s stop working, along with the other computers internet in the house. To get it to work again, I have to completely change my IP.

Moparisthebest:

Block his IP with a firewall? That was hard…

How would I go about doing that without knowing his IP?

Read full topic
